Rulings.HAT:
● This is a Quick Effect.
Quick Effects are Fast Effects.
● When this card is successfully summoned, if nothing is triggered, 
you can activate this card's fast effect before your opponent can activate any fast effect.
EG: When this is summoned, you can activate its effect before your opponent can use "Bottomless Trap Hole". Then, as Chain Link 2, Bottomless can be chained.
